Nature.Name: Hustler
Nature.Content: Clear your exhaustion track when you try to spring a con on a powerufl or dangerous mark.

Connections.Name: Family
Connections.Content: After _ and I pulled off an impressive heist and stole something very valuable from a powerful faction, my bad choices landed me in dire straits. But they bailed me out, and we've been close ever since.

Connections.Name: Watcher
Connections.Content: _ saw through one of my cons, and turned it back on me. How? Why did we forgive each other?

BackgroundQuestions.Question: Why are you a vagabond?
BackgroundQuestions.Answer: I am on the run for my lies

BackgroundQuestions.Question: Which faction have you served the most?
With which faction have you earned a special enmity?
